PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-08432007-05-31,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectDeduction for Provincial Rebate (GST/HST)
PrecisRegulations Amending the DEDUCTION FOR PROVINCIAL REBATE (GST/HST) REGULATIONS which will allow merchants to give shoppers an instant refund on sales of books or textbooks packaged and sold together with either a CD-ROM or a website access code, in an amount equal to the provincial component of the HST.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0112 Publication Date: 2007-06-13
AttachmentsAttachment
